Bio

Hi, I am Torben Ott. I work as an IT consultant for data science and big data applications at Consist Software Solutions. Previously, I was a research scientist at the University of Kiel focussing on the modelling and simulation of highly correlated plasmas.

This site is generated by Jekyll from the site source adopted from jekyll-crisp-minimalism.
